enWisdom: God-wariness is the fruit of faith and the sign of certitude

Wisdom: الْوَرَعُ يُصْلِحُ الدِّينَ وَيَصُونُ النَّفْسَ وَيُزَيِّنُ الْمُرُوَّةَ
enWisdom: Piety reforms the faith, protects the soul and adorns magnanimity

Wisdom: أَفْسَدَ دِينَهُ مَنْ تَعَرَّى عَنِ الْوَرَعِ
enWisdom: He who divests himself of piety has corrupted his faith

Wisdom: إِذَا اتَّقَيْتَ الْمُحَرَّمَاتِ وَتَوَرَّعْتَ عَنِ الشُّبُهَاتِ وَأَدَّيْتَ الْمَفْرُوضَاتِ وَتَنَفَّلْتَ بِالنَّوَافِلِ فَقَدْ أَكْمَلْتَ فِي الدِّينِ الْفَضَائِلَ
enWisdom: When you keep away from the forbidden, refrain from that which you are unsure about, fulfil that which is obligatory and perform the acts that are recommended, then you have perfected the virtues of faith
Through true piety, religion is protected
The fruit of piety is the uprightness of one’s soul and faith
The beauty of religion is piety
The sign of a servant’s faith is his piety
The cause of integrity of faith is piety
The cause of the probity of [one’s] faith is God-wariness
The cause of righteousness of the soul is piety
The uprightness of religion is through virtuous piety and certitude
The rectitude of religion is [through] piety

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالْوَرَعِ فَإِنَّهُ عَوْنُ الدِّينِ وَشِيمَةُ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
enWisdom: You must espouse piety, for indeed it is a helper of the faith and a trait of the sincere ones
Nothing reforms the faith like piety
The basis of religion is piety
Nothing reforms the faith like piety
